Rainy_Day_0: I really like this new farm life. The fresh air, the view of your farm. It's nice.
Rainy_Day_1: I was gonna make pancakes but I think I burnt the pan. Nevermind.$2#$b#Hey, maybe you can teach me how to cook?$3
Rainy_Day_2: Awh hon, your hair is all wet.$2#$b#Let me grab you a towel. I'll make us some hot chocolate and we can sit in front of the fire.$3
Rainy_Day_3: Y'know, when it rains worms come up to the surface of the soil. Makes them easier prey.#$b#Did you know that?$1
Rainy_Day_4: I think we have a leak in the roof. I'll need to get a bucket later.#$b#For now I'll just try and patch it up with some old sheets. I'll call Robin tomorrow.$1
patio_Tom: I had a pet lizard in 3rd grade called Elsie.#$b#But apart from that, I've never had a pet before.$1
Rainy_Day_Steve: Thank you - for convincing me to stay here. Just- thank you, so much. I love you.$4
Rainy_Night_0: It's getting cold. I'll make sure the fire is on.#$b#So how was your day? What did you get done?$4
Rainy_Night_1: Ugh I don't like spiders, or any other insects. They're attracted to my hair. Oh hey! So are you!$3#$b#Haha, but don't worry. If you need someone to get a spider or take it outside, I will gladly do so.$1
Rainy_Night_2: I was reading the other day, a comic book. I'm getting into those now. You should try them too.#$b#Dustin convinced me to try them and he wasn't wrong.$3
Rainy_Night_3: If you don't mind, I was reading some of your novels today.#$b#And now I get why you read them. They're pretty great!$1
Rainy_Night_4: I'm pretty tired after a day's work, but I'm sure it's nothing compared to what you do.#$b#Marlon's still tutoring me. It's a lot of work.$1
Rainy_Night_5: Did you go mining today? Did you get hurt?$a#$b# I swear I'll decapitate those little-#$b#Sorry. I'm just glad you're safe.$b
Rainy_Night_Steve: I hope it doesn't rain tomorrow. I'm counting on some warm sunshine for us both.#$b#I'll fill some bottles with water just in case.$3
Indoor_Day_0: Remember that rainy night? I almost left town that night. I had a bag packed and I was gonna run.$2#$b#But don't worry, I'd never leave now.$1
Indoor_Day_1: Honey, I made you breakfast! Well, er, I did. I think your pet ate it though.$2#$b#It's probably for the best, it was extremely burnt anyways.
Indoor_Day_2: I heard Haley has a crush on Alex. They've been friends for ages. Apparently she liked me, but I wasn't having that.
Indoor_Day_3: I'm gonna stay inside today and catch up on some reading, if that's good with you.$1#$b#See you later hon.
Indoor_Day_4: Has Gus finally spoke to Emily yet? I mean, Emily is single. He needs to be confident and do it.$h
Indoor_Day_Steve: I miss you when you leave. Don't stay out too long, kay?
Indoor_Night_0: You're so damn beautiful, I hope you know that hon.$1
Indoor_Night_1: I wish Dustin could have come to our wedding.
Indoor_Night_2: Hon, you liked tired. Did everything go okay today?$s
Indoor_Night_3: I love you, you know that right?$b
Indoor_Night_4: Should I try to get buff like Alex? Nah. You like me just the way I am, I hope.$1
Indoor_Night_Steve: I used to have a diary, and hid it under my pillow. Who knows where it is now.#$b#I think.. my parents stole it.$2
Outdoor_0: Our place is pretty nice. The farm looks so good.#$b#Never took myself for a farmer but here we are!$3
Outdoor_1: Is your pet's food bowl full? I would fill it but I don't have a watering can.#$b#Oh, I'll just borrow yours if it's ok?$3
Outdoor_2: Do we have a rooster on our farm? I wake up early every morning from hearing one. It's not annoying.#$b#Nope. Not annoying.
Outdoor_3: You wanna know something? I kinda used to have a crush on Abigail. But when I found out she liked Sebastian, I lost all feelings immediately.$1
Outdoor_4: Should we play football? Keep in mind I might beat you.$h
Outdoor_Steve: Tell me all about how you made such a beautiful farm.$4
funLeave_Steve: I'm gonna head to the beach today. It'll lighten my hair. I'll see you later, love.
funReturn_Steve: Well Alex showed up and we played football together. How was your day?
OneKid_1: I can't beleive I'm a dad... how cool is it?$1#$b#I get to give them what I never got.
TwoKids_0: We have two beautiful kids, @. I'm so glad I met you.
TwoKids_2: I still can't beleive it. Look out our family!
TwoKids_3: I want to give our children a good childhood. No monsters. And no spiky bats.
Good_1: Great times are ahead of us!
Good_2: You're a good person, I'm glad I know you.$4
Good_3: I can't cook but you can and you're amazing at it!
Good_4: I love living here. It just so nice and peaceful.
Good_5: I think we should head to the beach, the water's warm.$4
Good_7: You know I wouldn't give you up for anything.$b#$b#
Good_8: I'm so glad I met you.#$b#And one day, maybe we'll have lots of grandchildren running around our farm.$b
Good_9: Hey @, how are you?$4#$b#%Steve kisses your cheek%
Neutral_0: I enjoy being outside. It's a good way of relaxing.
Neutral_1: I once used to be a really bad person, times have changed luckily.
Neutral_2: Things are okay around here. But... I don't know. Nevermind.$2
Neutral_3: Is everything okay with you right now? Things haven't been as...$2
Neutral_4: Cooking isn't my favourite thing to do. Well, you can cook at least.$2
Neutral_5: I think I might skip town to see the newest Marvel movie. Are you a fan?
Neutral_6: I just don't get how Alex can work out so frequently.
Neutral_8: Can I tell you a story? Oh, you're busy?$2#$b#Right.
Neutral_9: Should we buy some more films?
Bad_0: Look, I need confirmation. Are you having second thoughts about... us?$2
Bad_1: Maybe I should have just gone for Haley when I had the chance... she liked me for a while. Now it's all about Alex.$2
Bad_2: Did I do something wrong? Am I not worth it anymore?$2
Bad_3: Why don't we talk as much anymore?$2
Bad_5: If you want to back out of this relationship... please just tell me.$2
Bad_6: You helped me into my best self. But now you've gone all distant.$2
Bad_8: I don't really want to talk to you.$2
spring_1: My new year's resolution is to care less about the past. I want to live in the present with you.
spring_8: Things are slowly warming up now. Even though it's spring. Summer is soon!
spring_23: I won't be dancing tomorrow, but I wouldn't mind if you danced with someone else. As long as they aren't Alex. Or Harvey. Or Sebastian. Or Hailey. Or Shane. Or Clint. Or Linus. Or...
summer_1: The heat of summer is upon us!#$b#Drink plenty of water and don't overwork yourself.
summer_8: If you like, we can have a nice beach date together.#$b#I think you'd enjoy a refreshing dip in the ocean to cool off!$1
summer_15: The heat can really get to you sometimes. I hope Alex can give us a discount for icecream!$0
fall_1: Isn't fall just so calming? Orange and red and yellow leaves everywhere!$1
fall_8: I'll collect extra wood to store for winter. Nothing better than a warm fire on a cold day.$4
fall_15: What are you going to put on display tomorrow? I hope you outshine Pierre.#$e#He wins every year! I hope you beat him!$1
fall_26: You won't beleive how excited I am to stuff myself with food. It's the best part of the festival!$1
winter_1: Winter's here already. Last time I checked it was summer!$u
winter_7: Are you going to fish tomorrow, doll? Go make Willy proud for me.#$e#I don't mind if you don't win, as long as you don't let anyone else win.
winter_28: Thank you so much for staying by my side all year. I'm so lucky to have someone like you in my life.$4#$b#To celebrate the New Year! [348]
spouseRoom_Steve: Babe, do you know where I put my hair gel? I can't find it.
